briefTitle: Genotyping and Phenotyping of CYP2D6 Breast Cancer Patients on Tamoxifen
officialTitle: Genotyping and Phenotyping of CYP2D6 as Predictor of Z-endoxifen Plasma Levels in Breast Cancer Patients on Tamoxifen Treatment
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Breast cancer patients on tamoxifen treatment for at least 4 months

Exclusion Criteria:

* Abnormalities in liver markers (AST \>2.5 x ULN)
